code: import{SHORT_MOVIES}from'./constants';export var checkResponse=function checkResponse(res){if(res.ok){return res.json();}return Promise.reject("Error: ".concat(res.status));};export function filterMovies(movies,query){var moviesByQuery=movies.filter(function(movie){var movieRu=String(movie.nameRU).toLowerCase().trim();var movieEn=String(movie.nameEN).toLowerCase().trim();var userQuery=query.toLowerCase().trim();return movieRu.indexOf(userQuery)!==-1||movieEn.indexOf(userQuery)!==-1;});return moviesByQuery;}export function filterDuration(movies){return movies.filter(function(movie){return movie.duration<SHORT_MOVIES;});}export function durationConverter(duration){var hours=Math.floor(duration/60);var minutes=duration%60;return"".concat(hours,"\u0447").concat(minutes,"\u043C");}
